item.title: Harry Potter FM - Informed Spec Chat
item.dc:creator: Centuries
item.description:
ChopChop:

Why are you even getting bothered that much by a simple “Anti-Claim” Mechanic.

Because I randed that role and I feel it was a tad bit unfair that town just got to learn what was the anti-claim?

Read full topic
item.source: Harry Potter FM - Informed Spec Chat

item.title: Harry Potter FM - Informed Spec Chat
item.dc:creator: ChopChop
item.description:
Centuries:

dont really know why you made it sound like i complained about anything when the only thing i complained about setup-wise was that townies were just able to go “what is the anti-claim” and then just learn that they could claim their role without any worries

like, im not really complaining about the fact its weak, the biggest issue is that it’s useless because with the info you gave them, the role, in context, was useless and the only time I was able to actually use it was a stretch.

Claimvig exists as a way to scare town away from claiming, you informing town what the claimvig does, just allows them to claim for free.

I never complained about Gorta tracking me, him doing it is the right thing, I’m more-so annoyed about the fact his past 3 games with me, I’ve been the person he has talked about the most, which like, yeah I randed scum twice but it still doesn’t make it a good play.

Fakeclaims were whatever and in the end I never even used mine.

Only thing I will complain about is town just learning what the anti-claim is for no reason which is something that, at best, should be a mech-oracle thing.

Why are you even getting bothered that much by a simple “Anti-Claim” Mechanic.
If anyone should be complaining about that shit it’s me but I’m not complaining one bit because I see nothing wrong with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Harry Potter FM - Informed Spec Chat

like, im not really complaining about the fact its weak, the biggest issue is that it’s useless because with the info you gave them, the role, in context, was useless and the only time I was able to actually use it was a stretch.

Claimvig exists as a way to scare town away from claiming, you informing town what the claimvig does, just allows them to claim for free.

I never complained about Gorta tracking me, him doing it is the right thing, I’m more-so annoyed about the fact his past 3 games with me, I’ve been the person he has talked about the most, which like, yeah I randed scum twice but it still doesn’t make it a good play.

Only thing I will complain about is town just learning what the anti-claim is for no reason which is something that, at best, should be a mech-oracle thing.
